title: Elementalist Lux is now out!
body: Edit for typo: Elementalist Lux is *not* out!

replies.body: She is out she was released an hour ago riot were trolling the whole time I just played a game with her

I don't mind a suspense; the pause before the applause, but Tencent has gone from queing the hype train to ruining it to causing anger with a delay this long.

I don't _need_ the skin, and I am well aware of not being forced to buy the skin (for those wishing to apply those arguments), but going this long with nothing other than silence is not a good business move on their part.

@ Tencent:
Do feel free to postpone the release, but after a few days, give us the release date. OFFICIALLY! Even if that date is a few days into the future - and you don't have to give any reason - just give us the exact release date.

Because this is BS.

And what about the release bundle? What will be in it? 3250 RP for what exactly...? The skin, 10 icons and the ward skin, hmm? With no promotional sale, it better be a good bundle, whatever it is...

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
